name: microfrontend-portfolio
description: Microfrontend architecture with React 18, TypeScript, Zustand, Module Federation

scripts.build:gh-pages: turbo run build -- --mode production && node scripts/prepare-gh-pages.js
scripts.release:shell: npm run version:shell && git add packages/shell/package.json && git commit -m 'chore(shell): bump version' && git push
scripts.release:products: npm run version:products && git add packages/mfe-products/package.json && git commit -m 'chore(products): bump version' && git push
scripts.release:cart: npm run version:cart && git add packages/mfe-cart/package.json && git commit -m 'chore(cart): bump version' && git push
